description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Pumpkin, Chickpea & Quinoa Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grain salad,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Spinach
name: Spiced Pumpkin, Chickpea & Quinoa Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g kent pumpkin, peeled, deseeded, cut into 2cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine oil and curry paste in a bowl. Add pumpkin and chickpeas and toss to coat. Transfer to tray. Roast for 30-40 minutes or until pumpkin is tender.
Meanwhile, cook quinoa according to packet instructions. Set aside. Whisk dressing ingredients together.
To make dressing combine yoghurt, lemon juice, tahini and garlic.
To serve, combine quinoa, pumpkin and chickpeas. Top with spinach and coriander. Spoon over dressing.
